title: BlackRock Now Manages Over $10 Trillion in Assets
sub_head: The money manager’s profit rose 6% in the fourth quarter
body:
BlackRock Inc. posted higher quarterly profit, and market gains lifted the investment firm’s assets under management above $10 trillion.
The money manager reported net income of $1.64 billion, or $10.63 a share, in the fourth quarter, up 6% from $1.55 billion, or $10.02, in the same period a year earlier.
